column4: Hello there, anyone feeling helpful? Trying to install Ubuntu, getting a GRUB install failure with code 1.
Err, I have not yet install GRUB at all
I have one sata drive with a ntfs partition without any os, which is sda1, and then I have about 10gb of free space to install Ubuntu. Isn't Ubuntu trying to install GRUB itself?
ubuntu will install GRUB by itself
